title: Project ArkID
description: Schema for representing Project ArkIDs, including related metadata such as people, budget, and publications. The ArkID system is designed to provide a standardized way for research projects to be uniquely identified, with the goal of improving collaboration and data integration across the research ecosystem.

arkidProject.description: Unique ArkID for the project, compliant with ISO 27729 (ISNI) standard. The ArkID is a 16-digit number prefixed with 'ARKP-' that uniquely identifies the project.

projectAcronym.description: The short acronym or abbreviation used to refer to the project.

fullProjectTitle.description: The complete title of the project.

projectBrief.description: A short summary or description of the project.

startDate.description: The start date of the project, in ISO date format (YYYY-MM-DD).

endDate.description: The end date of the project, in ISO date format (YYYY-MM-DD).

currency.description: The ISO 4217 three-letter currency code for the project budget.

amount.description: The total budget amount for the project, as a positive integer value.

website.description: The website URL for the project.

firstName.description: The first name of the person.

lastName.description: The last name of the person.

arkidUser.description: The unique ArkID for the user, compliant with ISO 27729 (ISNI) standard.

orcidId.description: The unique ORCID identifier for the person, in the format 'xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx'.

role.description: The role or position of the person within the project.

organizationName.description: The name of the organization the person is associated with.

arkidOrg.description: The unique ArkID for the organization the person is associated with, compliant with ISO 27729 (ISNI) standard.

organizationRole.description: The role of the organization in relation to the project.

arkidOrg.description: The unique ArkID for the organization, compliant with ISO 27729 (ISNI) standard.

rorId.description: The unique Research Organization Registry (ROR) identifier for the organization.

doiOrgId.description: The unique Digital Object Identifier (DOI) for the organization.

picId.description: The unique Participant Identification Code (PIC) for the organization.
